description:
Deletes the Windows systemstatebackup using wbadmin.exe.
This technique is used by numerous ransomware families.
This may only be successful on server platforms that have Windows Backup enabled.
 Author: frack113. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Wbadmin Delete Systemstatebackup
query: ((image:*\\wbadmin.exe OR process.command_line:*wbadmin*) AND (process.command_line:*delete\ * AND process.command_line:*systemstatebackup\ * AND process.command_line:*\-keepVersions\:0*))
